stories.title: How TechCorp Reduced Observability Costs by 80%
benefits: Improved MTTR from hours to minutes
Consolidated 5 monitoring tools into one platform
stories.description: TechCorp, a leading SaaS provider with over 200 microservices, was struggling with rising observability costs and fragmented tooling. After evaluating several solutions, they chose OpenObserve for its cost efficiency and comprehensive feature set.

stories.title: FinanceApp's Journey to Cloud-Native Observability
benefits: Scaled monitoring to handle 10x traffic growth
stories.description: When FinanceApp began their cloud migration journey, they needed a scalable observability solution that could handle their growing transaction volume while maintaining strict security and compliance requirements. OpenObserve provided the perfect balance of performance and cost-efficiency.

stories.title: How ShopNow Survived Black Friday with OpenObserve
benefits: Handled 300% increase in traffic without downtime
Identified and fixed bottlenecks in real-time
Saved an estimated $2M in potential lost sales
stories.description: For e-commerce giant ShopNow, the holiday shopping season represents over 40% of their annual revenue. When their previous monitoring solution failed during a crucial sales period, they turned to OpenObserve to ensure they would never face the same issue again.
